amendment.description: Amendment provides a definition of the term "punitive damages" for the purposes of the legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House report 106-498 to clarify that the term "punitive damages" does not include civil penalties, civil fines, or treble damages assessed or enforced by a government agency under federal or state statute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
